title.rendered: Our Favourite Vodafone Mobile Phone Deals

content.rendered:
At Fonehouse we’re proud to partner with some of the very best mobile communications networks in the world, meaning that we can offer you fantastic mobile phone deals on all of your favourite smartphone brands.

We always endeavour to bring you our lowest prices ever, and with that in mind in this blog post we’ve selected our very favourite Vodafone deals for you to browse through. So whether you’re a dedicated loyalist to a particular smartphone manufacturer, you’re looking for a change or you’re just not quite sure what it is you’re after, read on to discover our favourite Vodafone mobile phone deals that we currently have on offer.

iPhone

Currently at Fonehouse you can get the recently released iPhone 8 Plus on a Vodafone Red Entertainment Plan for just £53 per month and with absolutely nothing to pay up front! The iPhone 8 Plus has been met with incredibly positive results, so you’d be crazy not to take advantage of this brilliant deal that will give unlimited texts and minutes, £10 cashback and a huge 32GB of data! On top of that you’ll also have your pick of a Spotify, NowTV or Sky Sports subscription to enjoy as part of your monthly plan.

Samsung

The Samsung Galaxy Note 8 was released under more than a little pressure following the controversy surrounding its predecessor, the Note 7. Luckily for Samsung the Note 8 was met with rave reviews and quickly became a hit. Currently on Vodafone you can get the Note 8 for just £47 per month on a Red Extra plan over 24 months. You’ll have nothing to pay upfront and you’ll be able to take advantage of unlimited texts and minutes, 16GB of data and a fantastic £50 cashback!

Huawei

If you’re looking for a high end phone that’s a little more affordable and easy to use then the Huawei P20 Lite may be just what you’re looking for. As the cheapest model in the brand new P20 series this is one handset that packs a lot of punch for its price. For just £35 per month you can get the P20 Lite with unlimited texts and minutes, 16GB of data and pay nothing up front on a Vodafone Red Extra plan. As if that wasn\’t good enough, you can also get a whopping £110 cashback!

Sony

The Sony Xperia XZ2 Compact was released earlier this year to coincide with the release of the XZ2. Believe us when we say that this is a really great little phone that has really impressed us here at Fonehouse HQ. You can get your hands on the Xperia XZ2 Compact, with unlimited texts and minutes, a huge 60GB of data and an entertainment subscription for just £47 per month across 24 months and absolutely no upfront cost! As well as this fantastic Vodafone Red Entertainment plan you can also take advantage of one of our great cashback offers and get £80 straight into your pocket!

LG

We do love a good upgrade, and the LG K4 is the perfect example of why. The 2017 version of this beloved LG model brought with it some major improvements making for a budget handset that feels a lot more expensive than it is. Right now at Fonehouse you can take advantage of our cheapest LG K4 mobile phone deal on Vodafone and pay just £15 per month for 24 months to bag yourself 500 minutes, unlimited texts and 500MB of data. This Vodafone Essential plan also comes with £80 cashback, meaning you basically making money off of this great LG deal!

Nokia

The Nokia 5 is extremely impressive for what is regarded as a budget handset. With an incredibly quick processor and an impressive 13MP camera it really does have some great features that make it an incredibly good value smartphone. Currently you can get the Nokia 5 for just £30 per month across 24 months on a Vodafone Red Extra plan. With this plan you’ll get unlimited texts and calls, 16GB of data and a massive £130 cashback without having to a penny upfront.

If you’re on the hunt for a new Vodafone pay monthly mobile phone deal then why not check out the Fonehouse website for loads more amazing offers? We’re incredibly proud of our prices and are always looking for more to ensure that we are consistently bringing our customers the very best pay monthly mobile phone deals.
